array.string: CREATE TABLE APDBAdInstance (handle TEXT PRIMARY KEY, campaign TEXT DEFAULT NULL, adGroup TEXT DEFAULT NULL, ad TEXT DEFAULT NULL, creative TEXT DEFAULT NULL, bundleId TEXT DEFAULT NULL, searchTermId TEXT DEFAULT NULL, adamId TEXT DEFAULT NULL, adType INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, adFormatType INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, containerType INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, relayData BLOB DEFAULT NULL, adMetadata TEXT DEFAULT NULL, propertiesJSON TEXT DEFAULT NULL, brand TEXT DEFAULT NULL, advertiserCategory TEXT DEFAULT NULL)
